verses.verse: I will lift up<WH5375> my eyes<WH5869> unto the hills<WH2022>, from from where<WH370> comes<WH935> my help<WH5828>.
My help<WH5828> comes from the Lord<WH3068>, which made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>.
He will not allow<WH5414> your foot<WH7272> to be moved<WH4132>: he that keeps<WH8104> you will not slumber<WH5123>.
Behold<WH8104>, he that keeps Israel<WH3478> shall neither slumber<WH5123> nor sleep<WH3462>.
The Lord<WH3068> is your keeper<WH8104>: the Lord<WH3068> is your shade<WH6738> upon your right<WH3225> hand<WH3027>.
The sun<WH8121> shall not strike<WH5221> you by day<WH3119>, nor the moon<WH3394> by night<WH3915>.
The Lord<WH3068> shall preserve<WH8104> you from all evil<WH7451>: he shall preserve<WH8104> your soul<WH5315>.
The Lord<WH3068> shall preserve<WH8104> your going out<WH3318> and your coming in<WH935> from this time forth<WH5704>, and even for evermore<WH5769>.
